name: Space FURY - The Phantom Menace
description:
You are buying the finished game. All future upgrades will be free of charge.

  • An old-school space shooter in 3D.
  • Collect "PowerUp" its a main resource for you. It is both an improvement to your main weapon and armor.
  • Never take damage from enemies! Taking damage will weaken your main weapon and make it even harder for you!
  • Your equipment from the previous episode is saved for the next one. Keep a close eye on your resources, or you will have to replay the previous episode.
  • To get 5 stars on all episodes you need to show a masterful game!
